"Ah, <%me>. Are you ready?": "I'm ready to go. It's almost time."

"Trouble! What thoughts do our two Guardians have about how to deal with this battle, I do certainly wonder?!"
"You're not troubling them, you're just being troublesome, Patty."

"Of the following options, which do you choose?!

"A formidable enemy has them on the brink of defeat! But just then! \"Leave it to me and go on ahead!\" Doesn't that kinda get you fired up?!"

"Don't make fun of me! It's 1, obviously!"

"Obviously not...
The answer is 0."
"Oh. Okay. And then?"
"If we achieve our goal but someone we care about dies, then １ minus １ makes 0."

"That's 1 plus 1... so then the answer is 2!!!"
"Yes, very good. Now listen, you two."
"We understand that you'd give your lives for us. But if as a result of that, we end up losing you..."
"1 minus 2 is... I dunno! But, you get what we're trying to say, right?"
"So now, I want you two to both answer the first question at the same time! Aaand GO!"
"I'm definitely coming back alive!"
